Summary: Bright red/orange light moving south to north
divs: sighting detailssaw object approach from the south off the horizon filmed it as it approached. it was just a small red\orange unblinking light and there seemed to be a small hazy cloud around it but cloud wasn't part of emission that i could tell. it made no noise at all. my husband an atc has no idea what it could be, he actually filmed it. i have the film on my cell phone if you'd like to see it contact me.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Fernandina Beach
